about_the_game:
In the demo version, you can experience over 40 spells and up to 20 rounds!

Magic Overflow is an arena shooter game where you combine spells to create your own magic. Craft a powerful magic, and defeat all enemies!

CRAFTING

magic crafting system like programming

Connect spells...

And eliminate all the enemies!

Spell Types

There are 6 types of spells...

Caster Spell - The start point of the magic

Projectile Spell - Spawn a projectile

Modifier Spell - Change the nature of the spell

Event Spell - Cast the next spell whenever the projectile meets the requirements

Action Spell - Let the projectile take some action

Common Spell - Useful spell that help create magic

How many rounds can you survive?
